body.name: Voice Caddie VC4 Golf GPS Range Finder with Voice Output of Distance, Auto Slope, and Active Green Info on 40,000+ Courses - 8 Hours of Battery Life
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 18 hrs 39 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 12 hrs 54 mins
features: VOICE OUTPUT OF DISTANCE: Instantly hear accurate yardage with a simple GPS voice recognition command, ensuring precise club selection and confident shots

ACTIVE GREEN INFO WITH AUTO SLOPE: Gain a comprehensive view of the green with elevation change data, including distances to the front and back, for strategic shot planning with your VC4 golf distance measuring device
AUTOMATIC COURSE RECOGNITION: The VC4 golf GPS devices effortlessly identify the course and specific hole you're playing, saving time and streamlining your golfing experience

OVER 40,000 COURSES WORLDWIDE: Access a vast selection of courses from around the world with the VC4 range finder for golf, expanding your golfing horizons and catering to your global golfing adventures
EXTENDED BATTERY LIFE: Enjoy uninterrupted golf sessions with the VC4 course GPS units' impressive 8-hour battery life, providing long-lasting power to accompany you throughout your entire round
body.description: Tee up success and leave the guesswork behind with the Voice Caddie VC4 GPS Golf Distance Range Finder. This sleek device revolutionizes your game with voice-activated precision and smart features. No more guessing distances – simply ask your VC4 golf distance range finder and it will deliver accurate results, eliminating the need for squinting or button pressing. It also offers green information and slope features, giving you a caddy-like experience. The VC4 also automatically recognizes courses and holes, making setup a breeze! With over 40,000 courses worldwide, free updates, and multi-language options, they are the perfect range finders for golf enthusiasts all around the world. Despite weighing just 1 oz, VC4's golf GPS systems have a high-capacity rechargeable battery that lasts up to 54 holes. It even calculates the remaining holes to ensure you finish strong. Why wait? Unleash your full potential on the green with the Voice Caddie VC4 Golf GPS Rangefinder!"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I use this every time I golf.
reviews.reviewText: I love this thing. It helps to be more accurate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and accurate
reviews.reviewText: Love the voice caddy. Much better than a view finder type of yardage indicator. It is perfect for 95% of your golf shots. The only thing it doesn't give is the distance to hazards or bunkers but you can get an app for that. I attach it to the side of my cap and get an accurate distance on every shot.The battery lasts a long time. I can play two 18 hole rounds on one charge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It has recognized even the smallest course
reviews.reviewText: This thing has worked perfectly so far. Battery has long life and it has picked up every little course her in NE. Iowa. You can be way off in the rough and it will stay on the correct hole.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars if needed website is easy to navigate
reviews.reviewText: I had to go to website the thing started to speak in asian language With a little time and energy I got it straigtened out. al is good for now

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2021
reviews.reviewText: We have owned a couple of the Voice Caddie 200's, but find this well worth the purchase price. This new VC 4 has a much better satellite connection. We did not loose signal in the first several rounds while the VC 200 was constantly looking for the course. Battery life is 3X, good for 54 instead of 18 holes. Being able to get front, back and center distance to the pin was helpful and it has a nice feature of being able to measure the shot travel distance. We find that helpful when honing in iron distances. One minor issue for us was the belt clip. Nervous that it might not hold well, we added a short lanyard (like a wrist lanyard for a cell phone) and ran it through a belt loop. We found them dangling from that lanyard several times a round. We probably saved ourselves the search to find it. All in all very happy with this item!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Lives up to its reputation as a convenient device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars They don't answer their phone and won't call you back.
reviews.reviewText: I have used voice caddies for a lot of years now. Broke the clip off my last one and bought the new VC4 with slope. Worked well for several rounds. Had it attached to my hat on a windy day, my hat blew off and landed on the green and the VC4 stopped working. Called everyday for over a week to see if I could get it fixed and always got voice mail. Left messages at technical support, general mailbox, and even tried wholesale inquires and no one would call me back Thank you Amazon for taking the product back even if it cost me 20%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Problem with my Voice Caddie VC4
reviews.reviewText: This is my second Voice Caddie and I was very interested in distances taking account of the slope. I really like my older model so I treated myself to the new SC4. I played several rounds using the device and it worked perfectly. After my 5th round I started to have issues with the device which included the button getting stuck when I depressed it so the voice kept repeating the distance annoying some of the golfers around me. Secondly I had a lot of trouble shutting off the device I had to keep holding the button to shut down the device and since the button is very small it was hard to it while wearing a glove. On several occasions I had to put the device into my bag because it kept repeating distance because of the stuck button. I tried to return my device to Amazon but the date for returning the item was missed by by 7 days to I had to contact Voice Caddie and request an RMA. I am hoping that they replace the device but I had to pay for the shipping and insurance. I returned the device on May 11th so I will see what happens.Followup: I reached out to voice caddie and they set me up for a RMA so I sent my device back VC4. After evaluation they sent me back a new device which I received on 05/25/2021. On Thursady of the same week I used my replaced device for the first time and it worked fine for the first 9 nine holes but on the back nine I started to have the same problem as my first device. The button would get stuck causing the distance to get repeated several times in a row. I lifted the back of the button to stop it from talking and again tried to press twice to get front and back distance but the button kept getting stuck. I contacted voice caddie via email and simply asked what can they do for me. I am awaiting response. I sent my email on 5/29/2021.

reviews.reviewTitle: Does what it says. Convenientand easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I've only had the opportunity to use the Voice Caddya few time. It is so easy to use. Love that it calculates the slope into the yardage. Ability to calculate your shot distance
非常に使い方が、簡単で充電後すぐにコースで使える。高低を考慮した距離もかなり精度が高いので安心感がある。
worked as advertised on all courses I have played this year.

帽子につけるとデカいです。フロント・バックまでの距離を教えてくれる機能は素晴らしいですが、ダブルクリックの精度が悪く、シングルクリックで認識してしまいセンターまでの距離を教えることが多々あります。グリーンが２つある場合は、音声ナビが長すぎる。「左グリーン、フロント52ヤード、バック68ヤード、右グリーン、フロント40ヤード、バック66ヤード、」ってしょうがないですが、長い。これをセンター計測のシングルクリックで反応した日には、最悪です。

reviews.reviewTitle: VC 4 Ne donne pas le nom du terrain trouvé
reviews.reviewText: Une fois arrivé sur le terte de départ le VC 4 dit qu'il a détecté le terrain. Il m'ait arrivé que le VC4 n'avait pas choisi le bon terrain. Aucun moyen de savoir quel terrain il avait trouvé et aucun moyen de le changer.
